column1: Tired of the lack of progress in Washington on COVID-19 relief? Me too. Here's what the House has passed - twice - and what it means for #ma09. The Senate must take action & the President must stop playing political games with relief funding. #HeroesAct https://t.co/RBY1BG1EOa

10 weeks ago I joined my colleagues to pass the #HEROESAct. For 10 weeks that bill has sat on McConnell's desk while millions have lost their jobs or gotten infected by Covid-19. Trump & Senate Republicans must stop turning their backs on Americans & pass the Heroes Act now!
